divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were on our way home from the mall we were heading south on rt 136 in Warren RI whene my wike look up to see a slow moving triangular object in the sky. she said it had lights cirling around the mid section and red lights at the corners. I drove ahead to an opening where I could pull over but at that point it was way off in the distance. I watched till it went behind the trees. My wife is not a believer in UFOs like I am but she is shaken by what she has seen.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Providence
There were no other sightings in Providence on or around December 1st 2008
Summary: Large triangle shaped object with lights around the center and red lights at the corners.
